title: If there is no data for series, it should display a friendly error message to remind the user.
OB: When there is no data for the selected series, no error message or notification is displayed.
EB: When there is no data for the selected series, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a chart. 2. Set the data definition for the chart. 3. Select a column for the series without any data.
